overview: Maciek is no longer a boy, but has not yet become a man. He wants to satisfy the ambitions of his father, and - as everyone in the family - be a butcher. But he is too sensitive to make an animal suffer. The boy directs all his warm feelings towards an old, neglected orchard - the only memory of his mother - and discovers his supernatural abilities.

production_companies.name: Państwowa Wyższa Szkoła Filmowa, Telewizyjna i Teatralna w Łodzi

title: Mother Earth
